title: RIOT PLEASE EXPLAIN!!!!
body: I was in series i played 1 game lost and it said ive completed my series i would like a refund on my series please !!!

replies.body: judging by your stream, your garbage!. the elo system did the other players a favour!
bronze 1 speaking big and my stream just for fun do you think i take it seriously lol BRONZE 1 TALKING SMACK O %%%% YOU MUST BE SO PRO!
